channel.title: Official Exillion X Pkz Client So Ownage v.1.75
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh210/alecimage/graffiti-street-122325472811573.gif[/img] [B] ANY QUESTIONS ADD MY MSN [email]GUY4GAME105@HOTMAIL.COM[/email] [/B]
mhm hi this is alec105owns
NOTE: This is NOT the server Prima released, it is completely redone from alec105owns work. This is NOT leech of ANY kind!
Credits: 30% Prima (For creating server base and client) 30% reforced (For helping me add commands from hes server and stuff thanks ++) 40% me aka alec105owns and i alec i (For putting server+client together and releasing)
Client DL Link: http://uppit.com/HLCRUO
Features: wildy really works! perfect ::pure and ::master for non admins / mods pking server alot of mini games starter 15m 1nce! 4rm me and theive 300k per stall - Many more features, this server is great to just get on and play! - added new commands - added new stuff on client cuz decompiler thanks (= tons of stuff added so come try 2 much 2 name!
====================================== client side features new mod icons new gs spec new objects new weapons new armour new donars items new ban apeal system when u make a new acc new everything prima made half i just added stuff thanks!
PS: IF YOU SPAM/FLAME, YOU WILL BE BANNED/MUTED!!!!
[B] I DONT CARE IF U DOWNLOAD OR NOT I MAKE IT FOR FUN! [/B]
pictures for intertainment and 2 check this out [IMG]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh210/alecimage/9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh210/alecimage/8-2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh210/alecimage/5-4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh210/alecimage/4-3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh210/alecimage/3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh210/alecimage/2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh210/alecimage/11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh210/alecimage/10.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i257.photobucket.com/albums/hh210/alecimage/1.jpg[/img]
thanks for view
